hey 20/40 , I understand your desire to be nice to the unfortunate - Im just saying that if you're on dialup you can upload as fast as download and I dont think there was ever anybody charging for uploads. If their connection is slow then its too nice for you to upload at 300k or whatever, just turn the connection down to a trickle. I remember when I was on dialup I was happy to get anything at all and never complained about download speeds or such.
You could seed only when the seeders drops dangerously low. At least thats how I try to work my seeding of all your stuff :)
